title: 1914 T222 Fatima Cigarettes Alexander Hamilton Fletcher Burns
author: retroorter

posts.post_title: 1914 T222 Fatima Cigarettes Alexander Hamilton Fletcher Burns
posts.post_content:
Good Day All,

Hope everyone enjoyed a wonderful holiday! For sale are four Fatima 1914 T222's. 

1. Hamilton - St Louis Americans - small corner bend bottom left of card and small tear (.125") to the left of his glove $150
2. Burns - New York Nationals - small corner tear bottom left hand corner $125
3. Fletcher - New York Nationals - creases in corners and across middle of card right below his bat, running horizontally $150
4. Alexander - Phila Nationals - Missing two small pieces on top left and bottom left corners, hairline crease running vertical through the A in Phila and up through his right elbow. Overall a really strong card. $1500

Please feel free to PM me or drop me an email at [url]retro.orter@gmail.com[/url]
I am open to offers and bundle package deals! Cash, Money Order or Paypal via gift. Thanks again Guys/Gals!

-JM-
Those look familiar. Had my sights set on the Alexander till the newbie ebay seller sold them under the table. :rolleyes:
Newbie seller was me on eBay and I wanted to do more duediligence after all of the offers poored in and removed all of my listings!

[quote name="retroorter" post=1221361]Newbie seller was me on eBay and I wanted to do more duediligence after all of the offers poored in and removed all of my listings![/QUOTE]

I had a large snipe set. You would have done better to let them run. I have no interest now. Good luck....

Hamilton - sold 

price reduction on alexander to $1200
